Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4813 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.35-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-4813 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.35-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glibc is earlier than 2.35-7, affected by CVE-2023-4813
